name: AS_GSS_BL_ShowFactorWeight_v1_default
description: This rule represents the visibilty to show or hide factor weights in the factors tab.Modify this rule to show/hide factor weight, as per need.
sail_code:
/*

DESCRIPTION: This rule represents the visibilty to show or hide Factor weights in the factors tab.

DEFAULT BEHAVIOR: Factor weights are always shown
    hide subfactor weights if user is assigned as an evaluator
    UNLESS they created the evaluation or are assigned as a super user on the evaluation/criteria/parent criteria
    OR are a member of a super user group
    assignments are not limited to the associated groups

CUSTOMIZATION STEPS: 
1.Configure conditions accordingly  and set which groups can able to see the factor weights. 
See inline comments about what each field of the conditions represents .



EXPECTED OUTPUT TYPE: Boolean

*/
and(
  ri!evaluation[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.isWeightedFactorsRequired],
  /* 
    factor weights are always shown
    hide subfactor weights if user is assigned as an evaluator
    UNLESS they created the evaluation or are assigned as a super user on the evaluation/criteria/parent criteria
    OR are a member of a super user group
  */
  or(
    isnull(
      ri!currentFactor[recordType!AS_GSS_Criteria_SYNCEDRECORD.parentCriteriaId]
    ),
    not(
      contains(
        rule!AS_CO_UT_distinct(
          value: a!flatten(
            touniformstring(
              #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
                items: ri!allFactors,
                expression: fv!item[recordType!AS_GSS_Criteria_SYNCEDRECORD.CriteriaAssignment.assignee]
              )
            )
          )
        ),
        tostring(ri!loggedInUser)
      )
    ),
    /*
      as of GSS 1.7, these assignments are not limited to the associated groups
      so we check separately from the groups memebership
    */
    contains(
      touniformstring(
        {
          ri!evaluation[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.createdBy],
          ri!evaluation[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.evaluationChief],
          ri!evaluation[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.contractingOfficer],
          ri!evaluation[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.contractingSpecialist],
          ri!currentFactor[recordType!AS_GSS_Criteria_SYNCEDRECORD.criteriaChair]
        }
      ),
      tostring(ri!loggedInUser)
    ),
    /* super users groups */
    #"urn:appian:function:v1:a:isusermemberofgroup?okey=a!isUserMemberOfGroup"(
      username: ri!loggedInUser,
      matchAllGroups: false,
      groups: {
        cons!AS_GSS_GRP_CONTRACTING_PERSONNEL,
        cons!AS_GSS_GRP_FACTOR_ADVISOR,
        cons!AS_GSS_GRP_EVALUATION_CHAIRS
      }
    )
  )
)
